sentences.sContent: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.sCn: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.sContent: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.sCn: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

sentences.sContent: a strong believer in conventional morals
sentences.sCn: 坚守传统道德观念的人

synos.tran: 符合习俗的，传统的；常见的；惯例的

words.tran: 大会；[法] 惯例；[计] 约定；[法] 协定；习俗
惯例化；习俗化；象征手法化
使照惯例；俗化（conventionalize的过去式及过去分词）
使习俗化；使样式化；使照惯例

remMethod.val: 来自convention (n. 习俗， 惯例)

trans.tranOther: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type
